_header: Whoso oft sayeth this is with good will
Subjects: grace; prayers, to Holy Ghost; prayer, value of
_description: Promise of grace to those who often say the preceding prayer (5077), immediately following 5077 — four lines monorhyming

BodEngPoeta1.Transcription:
Wose ofte seiþ þis with good willeSchal fynde grace his
                    loue to filleHoly gost his herte schal tilleffrom synne him bringe
                    & ffendes ille

BLRoy17Bxvii.Transcription:
Ho so says þis with gode willeSchal fynd grace his luf to
                    filleÞo holygost his hert schal tilleffrom synne hym brynge &
                    fendes ille

BLAdd37787.Transcription:
Hose ofte seiþ þis with good willeSchal fynde grace his
                    loue to filleÞe holigost his herte schal tilleffrom synne him
                    bringe and fendes ille
